**Explanation:**  
After analyzing the provided problem, there is a single detected inconsistency, found in the "Purchase20231231002" entry:  
- The "recorded_date" field is "2024-01-14", whereas the invoice (which is considered highly reliable) states "On December 31, 2023, an invoice was issued..."  
- Therefore, the reliable (correct) original date is "2023-12-31".  
- No other discrepancies are evidenced in this row; all other fields match the invoice content or are not in scope for discrepancies.

All other entries either match or lack sufficient evidence within the "invoice" to identify an explicit internal inconsistency.
